title: Foundational E-Learning Course for Clinical Problem Solving

context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Education Based on Real Clinical Cases

learning_goals: Learners can analyze various clinical scenarios to identify core problems with 80% accuracy
Learners can construct and explain diagnostic protocols with at least three steps tailored to given clinical situations
Learners can perform treatment planning simulations with peer learners using collaboration tools in e-learning platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
